meta.title: Proven at Scale - Case Studies | Humble Rentals
meta.description: Real deployments, real results. From weekly farmers markets to citywide festivals, we've delivered reliable power to 100+ job sites since 2022.

hero.title: Real Deployments. Real Results.
hero.tagline: From weekly farmers markets to citywide festivals, we've delivered reliable power to 100+ job sites since 2022.

caseStudies.challenge: City needed reliable power for weekly farmers market without generator noise and emissions impacting the community.
caseStudies.solution: Managed battery fleet with weekly deployment, pickup, and charging cycle. Zero operational burden on city staff.
caseStudies.result: 30%+ reduction in generator usage across city events. Farmers market vendors get consistent, quiet power every week.

caseStudies.challenge: City-wide open streets festival needed distributed power across multiple miles of event space.
caseStudies.solution: Coordinated delivery of multiple battery units to different activation zones. Real-time monitoring during events.
caseStudies.result: Successfully powered 6 major events since 2022 with zero power outages. Delivered 250+ kWh of clean power.

caseStudies.challenge: Weekly outdoor concerts needed reliable power for sound and lighting without disrupting park tranquility.
caseStudies.solution: Recurring weekly battery deployments throughout concert season. Coordinated setup with production teams.
caseStudies.result: Average 41 kWh delivered per concert. Silent power solution maintains park atmosphere before, during, and after shows.

caseStudies.challenge: Street festival spanning over 1 square mile needed coordinated power across multiple vendor zones.
caseStudies.solution: Deployed 13 batteries across distributed locations. Coordinated logistics for simultaneous setup and retrieval.
caseStudies.result: 190 Wh delivered across entire festival footprint. Zero power issues despite complex logistics.
